# Filmfare Critics Award for Best Actor – Tamil

| website = [http://filmfareawards.indiatimes.com/ Filmfare Awards]
| image = Madhavan Saala Khadoos (cropped).jpg
| caption = One of the 2022 recipients: R. Madhavan
}}
The Filmfare Critics Award for Best Actor – Tamil is given by Filmfare as part of its annual Filmfare Awards South for Tamil films. The award is given by the chosen jury of critics assigned.
